/////////////////
// RUN THE APP //
/////////////////

1 - npm install
2 - Install and run mongoDB https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/installation/
3 - npm start

/////////////////
// RUN TESTS   //
/////////////////

1 - npm install (if you don't did it before)
2 - Install and run mongoDB https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/installation/ (if you don't did it before)
3 - npm test
